meanings.definition: Used as an exclamation of surprise or frustration.
meanings.sent1: Cripes! I can't believe I forgot my lunch at home.
meanings.sent2: Oh cripes, I didn't expect to see you here!
meanings.sent3: Cripes, I almost spilled my drink all over the table!
meanings.sent4: Her sudden announcement left me feeling like cripes in a storm.
meanings.sent5: The loud noise outside made me jump and shout 'cripes!'

meanings.sent4: The news of his sudden promotion left me feeling like cripes in a dream.
